meanings.definition: To remove or release from a kennel.
meanings.sent1: The dog was unkenneling itself happily after a long day in the kennel.
meanings.sent2: She carefully unkennels the puppies every morning for their playtime.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried unkenneling the secret hiding spot of its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: The sunlight unkennels the shadows, revealing the beauty of the garden.
meanings.sent5: With a gentle touch, she unkennels the bird from its cage, setting it free.

meanings.definition: To bring out or reveal something hidden or secret.
meanings.sent1: The detective was unkenneling the truth behind the mysterious disappearance.
meanings.sent2: Her smile unkennels her true feelings, even when she tries to hide them.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved unkenneling a rabbit from an empty hat.
meanings.sent4: The old map unkennels the location of the buried treasure.
meanings.sent5: His laughter unkennels the joy he feels inside, brightening the room.
